x="0.6181" y="3" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fxvWjqVY0a7v8ZCXeMHI-44" value="<font style="font-size: 12px;"><br>Monster has <br>searched 10 adjacent<br>&nbsp;rooms from the room where it <br>last saw the player and has<br>&nbsp;not found him.<br><br><br></font>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fxvWjqVY0a7v8ZCXeMHI-69" as="points"> <mxPoint x="497" y="230" /> <mxPoint x="497" y="200" /> <mxPoint x="435" y="200" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fxvWjqVY0a7v8ZCXeMHI-72" value="Yes" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="fxvWjqVY0a7v8ZCXeMHI-69" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.3272" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fxvWjqVY0a7v8ZCXeMHI-68" value="Monster arrives at the location and doesn't <br>meet the player." style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="520" y="150" width="160" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fxvWjqVY0a7v8ZCXeMHI-76" value="Player has been caught, so the game is over." style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="344.62" y="615" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vEprJyC-7m_cz5iOVNjX-5" value="Monster switches to walking mode.&nbsp;One during which it does not aim directly at one specific location in order to find the player." style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="364" y="70" width="110" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.font:
Monster has
searched 10 adjacent
rooms from the room where it
last saw the player and has
not found him.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 84px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 367px;

div.div:
Monster arrives at the location and doesn't
meet the player.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 655px; margin-left: 324px;

div.div: Player has been caught, so the game is over.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 135px; margin-left: 343px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Monster switches to walking mode. One during which it does not aim directly at one specific location in order to find the player.
